name: The Beast
description: Full path to The Beast (Dogma + Beast fight)

steps.label: Defeat Mom (Foot)
Get the Negative or Polaroid
Defeat Mom's Heart / It Lives (11 times to unlock door)
Go to Mausoleum (use knife pieces or Dad's Note)
Defeat Mom (Mausoleum)
Enter the crack to Gehenna II
Defeat the four Horsemen (Famine, Pestilence, War, Death)
Pick up Dad's Note
Go to Home
Defeat Dogma, then The Beast

name: Mega Satan
description: Path to Mega Satan (two key pieces)

steps.label: Defeat Mom's Heart / It Lives
Get Angel Room (skip first Devil Deal or use sacrifice)
Fight and defeat Angel for Key Piece 1
Get second Angel Room (next floor or sacrifice)
Fight and defeat Angel for Key Piece 2
Reach The Chest or Dark Room
Use both key pieces on the large golden door
Defeat Mega Satan
Defeat Mom (Foot)
Go to Downpour II (alt path)
Get the knife piece in the mirror world
Continue alt path through Mines II, Mausoleum II
Defeat Mom (Mausoleum) for second knife piece
Assemble the knife
Go to Corpse II
Use knife on the flesh door
Defeat Mother
Defeat Mom's Heart / It Lives at least once (unlocks Blue Womb)
In a single run, defeat It Lives (no time limit)
A beam of light appears; enter to go to Blue Womb
Clear Blue Womb I (two rooms)
Enter the boss room and defeat Hush
Unlock the Void (defeat Hush once)
After defeating Hush, a portal to the Void can appear
Or: portal can appear after Mega Satan, Boss Rush, or Mom
Enter the Void portal
Navigate the Void (find the boss room)
Defeat Delirium
Defeat Mom (Foot)
Go to Downpour II via alt path
Get first knife piece in mirror world (Downpour II)
Continue to Mines II, get second knife piece (Mausoleum Mom)
Assemble the knife
Go to Mausoleum II and use knife on the flesh door
Enter Corpse I
Clear Corpse I and go to Corpse II
Optional: defeat Mother at end of Corpse II
Defeat Mom's Heart / It Lives
Take the Negative (not the Polaroid)
After It Lives, go to the Dark Room (trapdoor)
Navigate Dark Room to the boss room
Defeat The Lamb
Defeat Mom's Heart / It Lives
Take the Polaroid (not the Negative)
After It Lives, go to Cathedral (beam of light)
Defeat Isaac in Cathedral
Enter the golden gate to The Chest
Defeat ??? (Blue Baby)
Defeat Mom's Heart / It Lives
Take the Polaroid
Go to Cathedral via the beam of light
Defeat Isaac
Defeat Mom's Heart / It Lives
Take the Negative
Go to Sheol via the trapdoor
Defeat Satan
Defeat Mom (Foot) for the first time in the run
Do it within 20 minutes (timer starts at run start)
A big door opens in the Mom boss room
Enter and defeat all waves (Boss Rush)
Unlock Greed Mode (put 500+ coins in the Greed donation machine)
Start a run in Greed Mode
Clear each floor (waves of enemies, then boss)
Reach Depths II (Greed)
Defeat Ultra Greed
Optional: defeat Ultra Greedier (second phase)
